item.title: Biodiversity Informatics
item.description:
I have been interested in informatics tools to deal with biodiversity data and ecological modeling since I started my PhD. Bellow you can find a list of the tools I have developed with the help of an amazing group of friends interested in the same topics.


Biodiversity inventory

Have you ever wondered where to go to register biodiversity more efficiently?

biosurvey is an R package that implements multiple tools to select sampling sites for biodiversity inventory. The goal is to increase the effectiveness of such sites by considering the relationship between environmental and geographic conditions in a region of interest. Take a look at the code and a guide if you are interested.


Ecological niche modeling

The following is a list of tools that implement methods and techniques to perform a series of steps in order to characterize and project ecological niches of species. These characterizations allow us to hypothesize about the factors that drive species distributions, and where suitable conditions exist.


ellipsenm


grinnell


kuenm


nichevol


rangemap
